meanings.definition: A rare calcium magnesium arsenate mineral with the formula CaMg₂(AsO₄)₂·2H₂O.
meanings.english_definition: A rare calcium magnesium arsenate mineral with the formula CaMg₂(AsO₄)₂·2H₂O.

examples.sentence: The brandisite was found in association with other arsenate minerals.
examples.translation: そのブランダイス石は、他の砒酸塩鉱物と共に見つかった。

etymology.value: Named after Stephan Ladislaus Endlicher (1804-1849), also known as Stephan Endlicher-Brandis, an Austrian botanist, numismatist and sinologist, who was curator of the mineralogical cabinet in Vienna.
